extension.summary: Play live video and audio streams from 4d.rtvslo.si
Predvaja žive video in avdio kanale 4d.rtvslo.si
extension.description: RTV Slovenia is a national radio and television public broadcast organization. With this plugin you can watch both video and audio live streams.
RTV Slovenija je državna radiotelevizijska organizacija. S tem vtičnikom si lahko ogledate vse televizijske in radijske kanale v živo.
